html:
blessed. The Hebrew word here, 'asherey, means "happy," as does the word used by Jesus in the Beatitudes (Greek makario_s).

layeth hold. This verb refers to making something part of one's life.

sabbath. To the Israelites, a Sabbath was not only the holy day on which they worshiped once a week but also the periodic religious holidays they observed. Keeping a true Sabbath is symbolic of keeping the whole covenant (58:13; Ezek. 20:12- 26; 22:8, 26).

hand. This term symbolizes the whole being. The person who keeps his hand from doing evil keeps his whole person from evil.
